item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

    public int barrowsRuns = 0;
    
     // Complete a run
     barrowsRuns++;
     
     // Get item
     if(barrowsRunes == 24)
         giveItemETC();

item.title: PI 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Create an int that is saved to the player’s save file, and every time the player completes a run make it go up by 1. Wherever the player goes to receive the item(s), make it check if the integer is 25/24 (depending if you start it at 0 or 1).

item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

  1. //barrows //Chest case 10284: if(c.barrowsKillCount < 5) { c.sendMessage("You haven't killed all the brothers."); } if(c.barrowsKillCount == 5 && c.barrowsNpcs[c.randomCoffin][1] == 1) { c.sendMessage("I have already summoned this npc."); } if(c.barrowsNpcs[c.randomCoffin][1] == 0 && c.barrowsKillCount >= 5) { Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, c.barrowsNpcs[c.randomCoffin][0], 3551, 9694-1, 0, 0, 120, 30, 200, 200, true, true); c.barrowsNpcs[c.randomCoffin][1] = 1; } if((c.barrowsKillCount > 5 || c.barrowsNpcs[c.randomCoffin][1] == 2) && c.getItems().freeSlots() >= 2) { c.getPA().resetBarrows(); c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomRunes(), Misc.random(150) + 100); if (Misc.random(2) == 1) c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().randomBarrows(), 1); c.getPA().startTeleport(3564, 3288, 0, "modern"); } else if(c.barrowsKillCount > 5 && c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 1) { c.sendMessage("You need at least 2 inventory slot opened."); } break;

  1. How do i make it so you need to do like 25 runs to get a barrows item from chest?

  2. How do i make ags protect over all right now its dfs?[/quote]

  3. How do i make it so when you kill all barrows brothers and u open chest that its at like 4% chance you get an item of barrows.

  4. How do i make ags the item the PROTECTS over everyother item?

Read full topic

item.title: PI 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

To answer your second question, most sources protect the item of highest value. Increase the value of the item so that it surpasses that of the other.

Read full topic

Or, just have to kill twenty-five barrows NPCs.[/quote]
He means that he wants them to do the whole run, going to the chest and everything, 25 times before getting a barrows item, I believe.

item.title: PI 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

  1. You can’t make them get one every 25 runs, but adding more items to the chest will make a less likely chance of getting a barrows item.

  2. I don’t understand that question, sorry.
